page.title: 17The Wellman Family.
page.content:
Colin (aged 38) works as area manager for am industrial finishing company.
Anita (aged 37) is a housewife. She works part time at Bishop Perowne High School as a dinner supervisor.
Victoria (aged 14) attends Bishop Perowne High.
Robert (aged 10) attends Claines CE Primary.
Family attends church on regular basis. Victoria a bell ringer, Robert a choir boy. Sundays spent mainly in the garden.
Colin travels a great deal in the course of his work, often leaving early in the morning and arriving home late in the evening.
